products.title: Bexley Sandstone Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bexley sandstone roller blind in brown. Made to measure from 15.13 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Introduce sutble shantung style weave fabrics into your interior styling with their contemporary bexley range.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2235 fabric colour: sandstone material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Bexley Creme
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure bexley creme standard roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality standard roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 200mm max width: 3048mm
 	min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm
 	fabric joins: blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.

 	guarantee: 12 months
